short_summary: Placing, lifting, removal, maintaining and servicing Buoys in the Province of Prince Edward Island
description: Placement of Buoys in the Province of PEI, inspection, maintenance and service. Consult tender document for requirements and detailed specifications
full_summary:
======================

### Contract Notice for Buoys Servicing and Maintenance in Prince Edward Island

**Reference:** cb-269-5693259
**Amendment:** 6
**Solicitation Number:** 30004812

**Publication Date:** 2023-10-25
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-08T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-11-08
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-14
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-06-30

**Contract Status:** Expiré

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

**Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the above methods

**Official Language:** French and English

**Trade Agreements:**

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** Prince Edward Island
**Regions of Delivery:** Canada and Prince Edward Island

**Contracting Entity Name:** Pêches et océans Canada
**Contracting Entity Address:** 200 rue Kent, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6
**Contact Information:**
    *   InformationsContactNom: Paul Fortier
    *   informationContactCourriel: paul.fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
    *   informationContactTelephone: (343) 596-9926

### Tender Description

The contracting authority invites Proposers to submit their Proposal for the Placing, lifting, removal, maintaining and servicing Buoys in the Province of Prince Edward Island.

**Summary:**

*   Proposers are required to provide their own vessel to complete this requirement.
*   They must inspect all buoys once a year.
*   They must place buoys on position in accordance with navigational requirements using GPS when required.
*   They must maintain buoys on position and in operation.
*   They must change lanterns as required.
*   They must lift, remove, place, store or change buoys as required.
*   They must complete Buoy Service Reports as required.

**Important Notes:**

*   All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting
